name: smart_replace
description: Smartly replaces a block of code in a file using fuzzy matching. Use this when you are not 100% sure about the exact whitespace or indentation of the target code, or when standard replace_file_content fails.

path.description: The absolute path to the file to modify.

search_block.description: The block of code to search for. Can contain inexact whitespace/indentation.

replace_block.description: The new block of code to replace the search_block with.
